headline: Lam Research (LRCX) Leads Etch Market as AI-Driven Memory Supercycle Fuels Robust WFE Spending Outlook Through 2026
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the best stocks for the next decade. On December 23, UBS raised the firm’s price target on Lam Research to $200 from $175 and kept a Buy rating on the shares. Earlier on December 18, B. headline: Why Lam Research Is a Must-Own Pick-and-Shovel Stock for the AI Boom
summary: Lam Research stock soared 141% in 2025 on surging AI-driven demand for advanced semiconductor equipment, solidifying its position as a premier pick-and-shovel play and backed by analyst support for future gains.
